body_html:
@peterjc123 Here it is.

System Overview:
Windows 10 (Home), VC 2017, using instructions on https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source

Here are the commands I have run (adjusted to my system):

set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
set MSSdk=1

call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64
python setup.py install

There's a lot of output, but here is the most important parts:

Build FAILED.

"H:\ML\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj" (default target) (19) ->
(Link target) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj]


"H:\ML\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj" (default target) (32) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj]

    0 Warning(s)
    2 Error(s)

Time Elapsed 00:01:20.92

(base) H:\ML\pytorch\build>IF ERRORLEVEL 1 exit 1
Failed to run 'tools\build_pytorch_libs.bat --with-cuda --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm_windows'

Here's the whole output:
Complete Log

If you need any system specific information, let me know.

body:
@peterjc123 Here it is. 

System Overview:
Windows 10 (Home), VC 2017, using instructions on https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch#from-source

Here are the commands I have run (adjusted to my system):

```
set "VS150COMNTOOLS=C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2017\Community\VC\Auxiliary\Build"
set CMAKE_GENERATOR=Visual Studio 15 2017 Win64
set DISTUTILS_USE_SDK=1
set MSSdk=1

call "%VS150COMNTOOLS%\vcvarsall.bat" x64
python setup.py install
```

There's a lot of output, but here is the most important parts:

```
Build FAILED.

"H:\ML\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj" (default target) (19) ->
(Link target) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\apply_utils_test.vcxproj]


"H:\ML\pytorch\build\INSTALL.vcxproj" (default target) (1) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\ALL_BUILD.vcxproj" (default target) (3) ->
"H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj" (default target) (32) ->
  LINK : fatal error LNK1104: cannot open file 'tbb.lib' [H:\ML\pytorch\build\caffe2\tbb_init_test.vcxproj]

    0 Warning(s)
    2 Error(s)

Time Elapsed 00:01:20.92

(base) H:\ML\pytorch\build>IF ERRORLEVEL 1 exit 1
Failed to run 'tools\build_pytorch_libs.bat --with-cuda --with-nnpack caffe2 nanopb libshm_windows'
```

Here's the whole output:
[Complete Log](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sXKXD7BqeCWG4wV9JP3f0yIbUOevXisdqiMFm_YmY38/edit?usp=sharing)

If you need any system specific information, let me know.
